name: Fate Commander Fighting
description:
• Massive roles
Hundreds of cards, all kinds of senkies, there is always the one you like.
• Relax and save time
No need to operate with your hands, even if you are offline, your senki will fight for you.
• Lots of experience with gold coins and diamonds
Throughout fighting, you will get large amount of experience and resources to develop your cards.
• Multiple module development
Boss, guild,contest,adventure,summon,forge and etc.Make friends here and form a powerful guild, become the King!
High definition, wonderful experience, waiting for you to download!
